posts.title: Massachusetts Bill Would Eliminate ‘Mother’ And ‘Father’ From Birth Certificates
posts.author: Sea_Still

link_metadata.description: The Massachusetts State Senate unanimously passed a bill that would remove gendered language from birth certificates.
link_metadata.title: Mass. Bill Would Eliminate 'Mother' From Birth Certificates

posts.title: MAGA Poll-Worker Megathread
posts.content:
We are now 96 days out from the election. As we saw last time, there will be no justice for a stolen election after the fact. If we don't all become poll-workers / election-judges and stop the steal as it's happening, our nation is done.

Here I've provided links for volunteering as a poll-worker in all the main swing-states, as well as some other 'reliable red / reliable blue' states.

Just remember, they will try to steal 2024 10x as hard as they did in 2020, but this time around the whole WWIII / Ukraine / Israel / China military apparatus will be assisting in the steal. We all need to FIGHT, FIGHT, FIGHT!!!

posts.raw_content:
We are now 96 days out from the election. As we saw last time, there will be no justice for a stolen election after the fact. If we don't all become poll-workers / election-judges and stop the steal *as it's happening*, our nation is done.

Here I've provided links for volunteering as a poll-worker in all the main swing-states, as well as some other 'reliable red / reliable blue' states.

Just remember, they will try to steal 2024 10x as hard as they did in 2020, but this time around the whole WWIII / Ukraine / Israel / China military apparatus will be assisting in the steal. We all need to **FIGHT, FIGHT, FIGHT!!!**


### Swing States and Links to Register as a Poll Worker:

#### **Arizona**
- [Maricopa County](https://recorder.maricopa.gov/registration/)
- [Pima County](https://webcms.pima.gov/cms/One.aspx?portalId=169&pageId=52257)
